synopsis.text: Takuo Senba's life takes an unexpected turn when he crosses paths with Dejiko, a charming woman with a mysterious aura, on a fateful Christmas Eve. Dejiko, who now works at a local bakery, finds herself captivated by Takuo's charisma. As the two continue to run into each other, they form an undeniable bond, leading Dejiko to eagerly anticipate their next encounter. However, when a letter from Dejiko's mother requests her return home and she spots Takuo with another woman, their budding relationship faces a significant challenge. With her younger sister Puchiko by her side, Dejiko must navigate the complexities of love and determine if her feelings for Takuo can withstand the trials ahead. Will Dejiko's enigmatic charm be enough to win Takuo's heart, or will their love story end in heartbreak?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
